title: Ticket #2039: Reduce use of _POSIX_PATH_MAX
description: _POSIX_PATH_MAX (usually set to 256) is a fairly small length for the full path to a file. We regularly see paths longer than this in real-world usage. Thus, the use of _POSIX_PATH_MAX as the size of a static buffer intended to hold a file path should be minimized, if not eliminated entirely.
